entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 before morning. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
